articles.title: The Lord of the Rings
articles.description: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel written by English author and scholar J. R. R. Tolkien.

articles.title: The Hobbit
articles.description: The Hobbit, or There and Back Again is a children's fantasy novel by English author J. R. R. Tolkien.

articles.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
articles.description: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone is a fantasy novel written by British author J. K. Rowling.

articles.title: The Hunger Games
articles.description: The Hunger Games is a 2008 dystopian novel by the American writer Suzanne Collins.

articles.title: Catching Fire
articles.description: Catching Fire is a 2009 science fiction young adult novel by the American novelist Suzanne Collins.

articles.title: The Maze Runner
articles.description: The Maze Runner is a 2009 young adult dystopian science fiction novel written by American author James Dashner.
